attributes.action: Bring in a law to stop the use of foreign call centres for British companies
attributes.additional_details: The use of foreign call centres causes huge frustration for the majority of customers due to inability of the operator to efficiently communicate with the customer . It also hugely increases the time taken to deal with enquiry’s and problems leading to the customer call charges going through the roof
attributes.background: Stop the use of foreign call centres for British companies .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be an operational decision for individual companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
